articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.title: Volatile president lambasts volatile cryptocurrencies
articles.description: Cantillon: Whatever about Bitcoin, is Trump correct to be critical of Facebook’s libra?
articles.content:
Donald Trump doesnt like cryptocurrencies. The US president took to Twitter to lambast bitcoin and its ilk. I am not a fan of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, which are not money, and whose value is highly volatile and based on thin air. 
Its not the firs… [+2060 chars]

articles.author: jane78
articles.title: Upto 10% Rewards in Bitcoin with TravelbyBit
articles.description: I just booked my flight and hotel in Cairns with TravelbyBit, and earned rewards in bitcoin. Although I paid with digital currency, you can still earn rewards if you pay with your credit card. If you’re a frequent traveller with an interest in crypto, I think…

articles.title: Square Cash App 2.53.2 by Square, Inc.
articles.description: The post Square Cash App 2.53.2 by Square, Inc. appeared first on APKMirror.
articles.content:
Its Friday. You wake up to a $15 Cash App notification. A pal paid you back for that pizza you shared. Your balance now reads $172.30.You use your new money to buy a coffee with your personalized Cash Card. You even hit up the ATM after.
